verses.roman:
'jīva'-nāma taṭasthākhya eka śakti haya
mahā-saṅkarṣaṇa--saba jīvera āśraya

synonyms: jīva—the living entity; nāma—named; taṭa-sthā-ākhya—known as the marginal potency; eka—one; śakti—energy; haya—is; mahā-saṅkarṣaṇa—of the name Mahā-saṅkarṣaṇa; saba—all; jīvera—of living entities; āśraya—the shelter.
translation: There is one marginal potency, known as the jīva. Mahā-saṅkarṣaṇa is the shelter of all jīvas.
